div.p: This code system https://paciowg.github.io/functional-status-ig//CodeSystem/assessment-label-code-system defines the following codes:

tr.td: Licensed nurse - number visits - five days prior to death
Restraints in chair/out of bed: trunk restraint
RN - number visits - five days prior to death

IADL (usual performance) - make light cold meal

Skin and ulcer/injury treatments. Check all that apply
Number of new or worsening stage 3

Care management, types/sources: supervision and safety
